# Chromaflow - AI Assistant Guide

## About This Project

Chromaflow is a professional web application for creating beautiful animated SVG gradients. It's designed for developers, designers, and content creators who need high-quality gradient graphics for their projects.

**Live Demo**: https://gradient-svg-generator.vercel.app
**GitHub Repository**: https://github.com/ChanMeng666/gradient-svg-generator

## Core Value Proposition

- **216+ Professional Templates** across 22 specialized categories
- **Real-time preview and customization** with instant feedback
- **RESTful API** for programmatic generation and integration
- **No registration required** - completely free to use
- **Open source** under MIT License
- **Production-ready** - used by 2,000+ developers and designers

22 categories including:

- **Nature/Organic**: Aurora, ocean waves, forest, fire themes  
- **Gaming**: Retro pixel art, neon arcade, energy blast themes
- **Luxury**: Gold, diamond, crystal, marble effects

- **Text Effects**: Glitch, luminance, rainbow animations
- **Advanced**: Consciousness Stream, Digital Life, Cyber Aesthetics

### 2. API Integration
Direct URL-based SVG generation with extensive customization:

**Basic Usage**:
```
https://gradient-svg-generator.vercel.app/api/svg?text=Hello&height=120
```

**With Template**:
```
https://gradient-svg-generator.vercel.app/api/svg?text=AI%20Project&template=neural-network&height=150
```

**Custom Colors**:
```
https://gradient-svg-generator.vercel.app/api/svg?text=Custom&color0=ff0000&color1=00ff00&color2=0000ff
```

**Advanced Multi-Color**:
```
https://gradient-svg-generator.vercel.app/api/svg?text=Rainbow&gradientType=spiral&color0=ff0000&color1=ff8000&color2=ffff00&color3=00ff00&color4=0000ff&duration=10s
```

### 3. Professional Quality
- Optimized color palettes by design professionals
- Smooth animations with customizable duration
- High-resolution output suitable for any project size
- Responsive design for all devices

## API Parameters Reference

| Parameter | Type | Default | Description | Example |
|-----------|------|---------|-------------|---------|
| `text` | string | required | Display text | `text=Hello%20World` |
| `height` | number | 120 | SVG height (30-300px) | `height=150` |
| `template` | string | - | Template name | `template=neural-network` |
| `gradientType` | string | horizontal | Gradient effect | `gradientType=spiral` |
| `duration` | string | 6s | Animation duration | `duration=8s` |
| `color0`, `color1`, etc. | string | 000000 | Gradient colors (hex) | `color0=ff0000&color1=00ff00` |
